name: Dice Forge
description:
An entry to the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Theme: Roll of the dice

Controls

Use the arrow keys to navigate menus.

X: X / V / M

O: Z / C / N

Description

Roll dice to battle your way through the labyrinth!

Claim new dice faces from your fallen enemies.

Switch up your abilities by swapping the faces of your dice in the workshop to get stronger as you tackle increasingly challenging foes.

Disclaimer

As expected for a game created in under 48 hours, this is an unfinished game. Apologies for the lack of music or art or really any semblance of a game.

Missing/Broken features:

  • Player reroll limits 
  • Status effects
  • Shops - option to sell unwanted dice faces for gold
  • New dice types - d12, d20 etc.
  • The rest of the game

Any and all feedback will be thankfully received!  :)
